sqlMap.select: /* PSCMPRD0012.selectCalendarScheduleList */ SELECT T.SCDL_SEQS , T.VENDOR_ID , (SELECT SUB.VENDOR_NM FROM TVE_VENDOR SUB WHERE T.VENDOR_ID = SUB.VENDOR_ID) VENDOR_NM , T.RSERV_START_DY , T.RSERV_START_TM , T.RSERV_END_DY , T.RSERV_END_TM , T.CELL_NO , T.SCDL_MEMO , T.REG_DATE , T.REG_ID , T.MOD_DATE , T.MOD_ID FROM TOR_SCDL_MGR T WHERE SUBSTR(T.RSERV_START_DY, 0, 6) = #currentMonth# ORDER BY T.RSERV_START_DY, T.RSERV_START_TM, T.RSERV_END_TM, T.SCDL_SEQS
